roleset.name: not connected, associated, wrapped up in
roleset.note: UNINVOLVED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to 'involve.01'. (from uninvolved.01-j)

role.descr: second entity which arg1 is involved with/in/by

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: The attached seminal vesicle is uninvolved by tumor .

roleset.name: uncomplicated, not convoluted
roleset.note: UNINVOLVED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to 'involved.02'. (from uninvolved.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: I liked the dry humor but the plot was uninvolved and silly, and not in a charming way.
